attributes.action: Could the government please look at ways of helping our people to train in the specialised subjects, such as science (to be encouraged to work in this country), instead of all the "fluffy" courses such as media studies.  Therefore we could grow a good British science & technology industry, rather than all of our ideas getting lost to the americans and so on. After all it was us who invented the television?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
University laboratories are closing down at a high rate, as students do not wish to learn any of the sciences any more. Students are encouraged to take up subjects that are near enough worthless.
Children are not encouraged in the school system to thrive, as many of the schools do not even offer the A/AS levels.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
